programme.title: Anak Ibu
programme.desc: Julia takes good care of her paralyzed and bedridden mother, but things are not what they seem to be.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a squatter settlement in Kuala Lumpur are haunted by the souls of Japanese soldiers perished during World War II.

programme.title: Jenny
programme.desc: A young woman's answer to a horror Bloody Mary challenge turns awry as she instead unleashes an evil spirit from her past to return to her life.

programme.title: Mountain Gun Fight Zombies
programme.desc: Wannabe-tomb raiders Tiger and Pole have failed in their latest attempt. On the way home, they are suspected of being thieves and end up in the lock-up of a village overrun by zombies!

programme.title: Busut Bonang
programme.desc: While investigating the death of Hassan, a local teacher, three people are attacked by an evil spirit called, Penunggu Busut.

programme.title: Munafik 2
programme.desc: Abuja, pengamal ajaran sesat menggunakan sihir/jin untuk menghancurkan sesiapa yang tidak mengikut ajarannya. Ini memaksa Sakinah untuk memohon pertolongan dari Ustaz Adam.

programme.title: Tales of Halloween
programme.desc: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.

programme.title: Kubur
programme.desc: Since she received an antique watch from winning a game, Nurin senses an other-worldly presence in her house.

programme.title: Murder Me, Monster
programme.desc: When a decapitated female body is discovered in a remote part of the Andes, a police officer starts to uncover bizarre theories, spooky legends and a blurring of the boundary between fantasy and reality.

programme.title: Anak Ibu
programme.desc: Julia takes good care of her paralyzed and bedridden mother, but things are not what they seem to be.

programme.title: Tokmoh Talent Agency
programme.desc: Seorang bomoh cuba mempelbagaikan sumber pendapatan dengan menyewakan hantu untuk digunakan sebagai pelakon tambahan dalam filem-filem seram.

programme.title: Penjaga
programme.desc: While out on a picnic by the river, a little girl spots a peculiar stone in the river bed. She picks it up and brings it home. Soon, disaster strikes.

programme.title: Lechmi
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered woman contacts four bachelors, enlisting their help to find her killer. A thrilling tale about the very real impact of psychic disorders, yet told with perfect comedic timing.

programme.title: Koboi & Vampire
programme.desc: On the bad advice of jealous friends, a man unwittingly causes his wife's death. She returns as a ghost to wreak vengeance on those who wronged her.

programme.title: Pee Mak
programme.desc: Based on a famed Thai folklore, Mak's war homecoming is greeted warmly by his gorgeous wife and infant son. What Mak does not know is, his family has been dead long before he is home.

programme.title: Blok 404
programme.desc: Horror and romance collide at a guesthouse, where various incidents come to a head on a very eventful BBQ night.

programme.title: Kafir: Bersekutu Dengan Setan
programme.desc: Separuh jiwa Sri tersimpan pada suaminya. Namun, setelah suaminya meninggal, Sri diganggu oleh pelbagai misteri yang membuatkan hidupnya porak-peranda.

programme.title: Make Me Shudder
programme.desc: Kisah sekumpulan pelajar yang pergi ke sebuah bangunan tinggal di sekolah mereka untuk cabaran mencari hantu.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep07
programme.desc: Mike's worst nightmare comes true when Louise finds her old toy, Chickie. Chickie is a horrifying squeaky toy and Mike can't bear to be near it. A perfect solution for the racoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep08
programme.desc: Fluffy lands in a bag of charcoal and now he looks like a racoon. Freddy and Mercury are convinced he's a thief like them. Now Mike is forced to face three masked thieves.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep09
programme.desc: The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep01
programme.desc: Mike wants to impress Iris by making some yummy tacos, but Fluffy and the Turtles use the extractor fan as a makeshift skydiving game. Then the racoons break in and try to steal the TV.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep02
programme.desc: Mike has to wear a cone around his neck after a trip to the vet. There's no way he can let Iris see him like this. He refuses to leave the house and the racoons rob the terrace.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep03

programme.desc: Several survivors detail the story of Jeffrey Epstein, the mysterious billionaire who lured them to his home through an elaborate series of female recruiters they thought they could trust.

programme.title: Intervention: Codependent S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Spencer's world turned upside down when his mother died in a motorcycle accident when he was aged 10. Instead of dealing with the lingering pain and loss, Spencer turned to heroin and meth.

programme.title: Intervention S13 Ep13
programme.desc: In an emotionally gripping documentary series, addicts confront their darkest demons and hopefully find a route to redemption.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: Kamiyah Mobley Story
programme.desc: Kidnapped at birth by a woman she grew up believing was her mother, Kamiyah Mobley, now 21, sits down exclusively with the award-winning journalist for a revealing interview about her life.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers S1 Ep01
programme.desc: A honeymoon cruise goes awry when the bride is allegedly blown off a balcony in the middle of the night. When the weather report comes in showing no wind, a murder investigation begins.

programme.title: Rescue Cam S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Citizens work together to help at a traffic accident. An unattended toddler teeters on the edge of a seventh-storey window. Campers find themselves trapped by a deadly California wildfire.

programme.title: Rescue Cam S1 Ep16
programme.desc: An SUV crashes into a river. Tampa officers spring into action after a plane misses the runway. A train crashes at full speed in Chicago.

programme.title: I Love You... but I Lied S2 Ep13
programme.desc: A 32-year-old delivery nurse's reckless mistake could tear two families apart and put a baby's life in danger.

programme.title: See No Evil S5 Ep01
programme.desc: On March 29, 2016, Louise Dickey is discovered brutally murdered in a bath. With no motive for the homicide and no witnesses, detectives seek out surveillance cameras to uncover the shocking truth.

programme.title: Fatal Vows S5 Ep12
programme.desc: When Tim meets Maryann at a Catholic mixer it's a match made in heaven. But while the future looks bright, a dark cloud gathers on the horizon - the shadow of Tim's ex-wife.

programme.title: Street Outlaws S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Big Chief gets a racer for the Nationwide Callout: Petey Smallblock New York, representing the Northeast.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks S2 Ep10
programme.desc: JD picks up a 1958 Ford C300 which is need of an overhaul.

programme.title: Dukes of Haggle S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Gene schools Robert on dumpster diving, but it's Robert unusual pick that gives them the upper hand in a trade-out for a Canadian Mountie canoe.

programme.title: Garage Squad S6 Ep04

programme.title: Overhaulin' S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Chip Foose and the A-Team restore the Camaro of a man who thought he got a great deal on an internet auction.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S10 Ep01
programme.desc: Wayne must take a leap of faith to buy a 1957 Porsche 356A 1500 GS Carrera. When Steve Jobs' 2000 BMW Z8 goes up for sale, the current owner turns to Wayne for help.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S9 Ep04
programme.desc: The crew finally talks a Camaro owner into swapping out his underpowered 305 small block for an overpowered 383 that will make 450hp.

programme.title: Kings of Crash S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Drivers' bodies and egos are feeling the pain of derby season as the Sweat brothers clash over who is the maddest of Mad Dogs.

programme.title: Garage Squad S6 Ep07

programme.title: Misfit Garage S3 Ep04
programme.desc: With trying to put the 1968 AMC AMX engine and transmission together, the mechanics find themselves in a circus of misfit parts and process.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep03
programme.desc: The chassis on the Jeep JL has been powder coated, so now it's time for final assembly.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection S2 Ep03

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep02
